quote_first: The first night, as soon as the corporal had conducted my uncle Toby upstairs, which was about 10 - Mrs. Wadman threw herself into her arm chai
quote_last: st night, as soon as the corporal had conducted my uncle Toby upstairs, which was about 10 - Mrs. Wadman threw herself into her arm chair
title: The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman
author: Laurence Sterne
